subject: Ground cable
description_text:
Good morning,

I bought the Simpson pro plus pedals recently from Amazon but my box did not come with an earth cable is this something you can supply?


Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi matthew popejoy,  Please provide your order number, and I will arrange for our operations team to send you a replacement.

Hi

My order number on Amazon was
204-6789473-5037118

Sent from my iPhone
Hi matthew popejoy,  Here is the tracking number : YT2529400706835790. You can track it via https://www.yunexpress.com/
